name: Gun-Swap Graveyard
description:
In this Tower Defense adventure, acquire a variety of upgrades to boost your stats, and weapons that you can give to turrets that attack for you!

Hi there! If you're reading this, thanks so much for giving this game a shot! I've been working on it for almost 3 months now and am finally releasing the Alpha version! If you have any feedback, please leave a comment! It really helps out, and lets me know what to improve upon!

How to Play

WASD to move (W to jump)

F to interact

1 to place turrets

(the in-game tutorial should cover everything else)
